A basic operation object used by the Pulsar interpreter.

Copyright (C) 2024 Trayambak Rai

Imports

../shared, ../../atom, ../../utils

Types

Operation = object
  index*: uint64
  opcode*: Ops
  rawArgs*: seq[Token]
  arguments*: seq[MAtom]
  consumed*: bool = false
  when not defined(mirageNoJit) and defined(amd64):
    called*: int             ## How many times has this operation been called this clause execution? (used to determine if it should be JIT'd)

Consts

MirageOperationJitThreshold {.intdefine.} = 8

Procs

proc consume(operation: var Operation; kind: MAtomKind; expects: string;
             enforce: bool = true; position: Option[int] = none(int)): MAtom {.
    inline, ...raises: [ValueError], tags: [], forbids: [].}
proc expand(operation: Operation): string {.inline, ...raises: [KeyError],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
proc shouldCompile(operation: Operation): bool {.inline, noSideEffect, ...gcsafe,
    raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
